name: Approve automated thank-you email before it gets sent
description: The wrong message going out can affect your brand and influence future interactions. With this template, merchants can now approve email content before it reaches the customer.

metadata.subject: Order {{shopify_order.name}} confirmation
metadata.message:
Hi {{shopify_order.customer.first_name}},

Thanks for your purchase! We're getting your order {{shopify_order.name}} ready to be shipped. We will notify you when it has been sent.

{% if approval.field != "" %}Additional notes: {{approval.field}}

{% endif %}Thanks,

The {{context.shop.name}} Team
